channel.title: What kind of hosting do i need for a webclient?
channel.description:
Im actually a website creator but only for forums and i have no idea what to do with the client.
Any good website hosters that will allow me to upload my client?

item.title: What kind of hosting do i need for a webclient?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Most webhost terms of service/privacy policy state that you are not allowed to use their service as a storage area. Meaning you cannot do this. Your best bet would be to use fileden or dropbox

Read full topic
